name: Obstacle 3.1
description:
UPDATE 3.1 - Options for changing the player character's colour have been added, as well there were a few minor changes and bug fixes.

Once again there are multiple versions! Use smallstacles if your screen resolution is tiny. Use the silent versions if there's trouble with virus detection on the sound versions. As well the source code is available.

Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate both the menus and the game itself. When in the game try to dodge the red squares!

If you ever need to force close the game just press o

RECORDS AT EACH DIFFICULTY

  • Easy - 178 (Kate)
  • Normal - 164 (Skylor)
  • Hard - 66 (Kate)
  • Extreme - 47 (Kate)
